title: 1970–71 Rangers F.C. season
text:
The 1970–71 season was the 91st season of competitive <a href="Association%20football">football</a> by <a href="Rangers%20F.C.">Rangers</a>.
Overview.
Rangers played a total of 53 competitive matches during the 1970–71 season. The season was largely overshadowed by the <a href="1971%20Ibrox%20disaster">Second Ibrox disaster</a> when 66 people were crushed to death on Stairway 13 of <a href="Ibrox%20Stadium">Ibrox Park</a> following an <a href="Old%20Firm">Old Firm</a> game on 2 January 1971.
Results.
All results are written with Rangers' score first.
